publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7797 Shona Robison: The Healthcare Improvement Scotland (Requirements as to Independent Health Care Services) Regulations 2011—That the Parliament recommends that the Healthcare Improvement Scotland (Requirements as to Independent Health Care Services) Regulations 2011 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*
